#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define slld(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define ss(x) scanf("%s",x)
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define bitcount    __builtin_popcountll
#define pb push_back
int main()
{
    //freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    int t,n,i,j,k,a[55],b[55],s,s1;
    sd(t);
    while(t--)
    {
    	sd(n);
    	s=0;
    	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    	{
    		sd(a[i]);
    		s+=a[i];
    	}
    	s-=(n*(n-1))/2;
    	if(s>=0&&s%n==0)
    	{
    		s1=0;
    		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    		{
    			b[i]=i+s/n;
    			s1+=abs(a[i]-b[i]);
    		}
    		printf("%d\n",s1/2);
       	}
       	else
       		printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
